message.content:
Here is the Python code to create a CSV file for the first 5 US Presidents with the requested information:

```python
import csv

# List of first 5 US Presidents
presidents = [
    {
        'name': 'George Washington',
        'start_age': 57,
        'start_year': 1789,
        'serve_years': 2
    },
    {
        'name': 'John Adams',
        'start_age': 60,
        'start_year': 1797,
        'serve_years': 1
    },
    {
        'name': 'Thomas Jefferson',
        'start_age': 58,
        'start_year': 1801,
        'serve_years': 2
    },
    {
        'name': 'James Madison',
        'start_age': 56,
        'start_year': 1809,
        'serve_years': 4
    },
    {
        'name': 'James Monroe',
        'start_age': 57,
        'start_year': 1817,
        'serve_years': 4
    }
]

# Field names in CSV file
fieldnames = ['Name', 'Age when started office', 'Year started office', 'Number of years served']

# Write data to CSV file
with open('first_5_presidents.csv', mode='w') as csvfile:
    writer = csv.DictWriter(csvfile, fieldnames=fieldnames)
    writer.writeheader()
    
    for president in presidents:
        writer.writerow({'Name': president['name'], 'Age when started office': president['start_age'], 
                         'Year started office': president['start_year'], 'Number of years served': president['serve_years']})
```

This code will generate a CSV file named "first_5_presidents.csv" with the following content:

| Name          | Age when started office | Year started office | Number of years served |
|---------------|-------------------------|---------------------|-------------------------|
| George Washington  | 57                     | 1789                | 2                       |
| John Adams        | 60                     | 1797                | 1                       |
| Thomas Jefferson   | 58                     | 1801                | 2                       |
| James Madison      | 56                     | 1809                | 4                       |
| James Monroe       | 57                     | 1817                | 4                       |
